text: Godzilla, King of the Monsters! is a 1956 Japanese-American disaster science fiction horror action giant monster film directed by Terry Morse and Ishiro Honda. == Release dates == April 27, 1956 November 5, 1956 July 30, 1957 September 11, 1957 October 10, 1956 June 12, 1957 September 6, 1957 March 24, 2021 HK November 12, 1958 February 10, 1959 June 10, 1958 July 5, 1957 March 16, 1965 May 29, 1957 December 2, 1956 ==References== * Category:1956 movies Category:1950s science fiction movies Category:Godzilla Category:American monster movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies about dinosaurs Category:American science fiction movies Category:Japanese movies Category:Movies set in Japan
title: Godzilla, King of the Monsters!
